name: Action Trainer 1 - Prototype
description:
A quick little beat-em-up prototype where the player hits a ball around a room.

This action trainer builds on the prototype action trainer by adding a second character and adding in more projectiles. 

WARNING: I got tired towards the end and may contain some bugs and forgotten features (sorry if you find any, feel free to let me know in the comments, I'll add them to the BUG/FIX LIST below and I'll fix them in the next action trainer). 

FEATURES:

A box training room with two characters, Albus and Elliot. 

Albus 

  • Strike
  • Heavy Strike
  • Shoot 
  • Heavy Shoot
  • Taunt/Roar
  • Jump (2X)
  • Dash

Elliot

  • Shoot 
  • Swappable Shot
  • Swap swappable shots (right stick/triggers)
  • jump (2X)
  • Dash

Sound control

Hit counter

BUG/FIX LIST:

  • The view controls only applies to Albus.
